main event: A UFO sighting was reported in East Point, Georgia on December 3, 1962, involving a bright light moving across the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light moving from west to east at a high speed,Witnesses included a driver and passengers of a car,The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes,The light appeared stationary for a short time before moving rapidly,The report concluded it was an unidentified aerial object.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: driver and passengers in a car
